channel.title: The Ultimate Runescape Gold Guide
channel.description:
***************************************** first of all i got hold of this through a friend and i'd life to share it. but first i want to ask mopar about putting the link to download and is this legal to do so normally you would have to pay to get this. ***************************************************
small preview:
There is an amazing new ebook called, "The Ultimate Runescape Gold Guide." It covers nearly everything you need to know about becoming the richest, wealthest, and most powerful Runescape player in the game...a Runescape Millionaire
Imagine being able to have any item in Runescape that you have ever wanted ... and finally call everyone else a NOOB!. Wouldn't that be great?
Or what about if you could learn how to fill your Runescape bank account with countless items ... having any color of Party Hat that you want (or all of them for that matter!). How would that feel if you could do this? The Ulimate Runescape Gold Guide can do this for you!
Imagine being able to finally afford that abyssal whip ... or always being able to afford your next armor and weapon upgrade, without ever having to worry how you will get the gold to get them.. It truly is possible, but you need to know how.
That's what this brand new e-book could help you to do.
"... it's like no other Runescape Gold Guide you've ever on how to put millions of gold in your Runescape bank account ."
Don't Be FOOLED by the Other Gold Guides out there... in this ebook...
You'll discover all types of exciting tips.
Here's a sneek peak at what you'll discover in "The Ultimate Runescape Gold Guide":
How to become one of the richest players in Runescape
5 simple ways to earn massive amounts of gold
The little-known way to make 60-200k per hour (works for free players and members alike)
5 proven steps to avoided getting Scammed or Hacked
2 simple keys to GROW and MAINTAIN your Runescape fortune
AMAZING! Discover in a matter of minutes how to get any item in Runescape that you have ever wanted.
4 proven strategies for generating the easiest gold (without ever having to level... even a lvl 3 noob can do this...it's that easy!)
A dirt-cheap way to start your very own Runescape Business! (this secret alone will bring in MILLIONS of gold pieces everyday!)
REVEALED! The hidden truth behind the secrets of Runescape Millionaires (all of the most well guarded tips, the pros don't want you to know about)
